/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with trees and buildings, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and perspective. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up on either side of the street, their monotone palette punctuated by occasional splashes of blue and green. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives the viewer a sense of being part of the scene.
